AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scuttle cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has always maintained that [PAWN_pronoun] invented scuttle, due to [PAWN_possessive] dislike of insect meat. Everyone around [PAWN_objective] knew it was a lie, but the scuttle was very tasty, so they feigned belief in [PAWN_nameDef] anyway.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: fire salts cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't exactly the best cook out there, [PAWN_pronoun] did know how to cook using fire salts, and this made [PAWN_objective] invaluable on long voyages.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: fisher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While [PAWN_nameDef] worked a tiring job during the day, [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed relaxing near the coast, and fishing for a while. Admittedly this wasn't actually that relaxing, as there was always the chance that a sea serpent lurking was lurking in the kelp.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wasten coraldale mudcrab chef
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earnt quite a living cooking Wasten Coraldale mudcrab. [PAWN_possessive] dishes were considered some of the finest on Pyandonea, which [PAWN_nameDef] could most certainly attest to.
